Generation II.Gold: It has incredible intellect and intuition. Whatever the situation, it remains calm and collected.
Generation II.Silver: When its head was bitten, toxins entered Slowpoke 's head and unlocked an extraordinary power.
Generation II.Crystal: Every time it yawns, Shellder injects more poison into it. The poison makes it more intelligent.
Generation II.Stadium 2: It has incredible intellect and intuition. Whatever the situation, it remains calm and collected. (Pokémon Red, Silver, or Crystal inserted) When its head was bitten, toxins entered Slowpoke 's head and unlocked an extraordinary power. (Pokémon Blue, Gold, or Yellow inserted)

Generation III.Ruby: Slowking undertakes research every day in an effort to solve the mysteries of the world. However, this Pok é mon apparently forgets everything it has learned if the Shellder on its head comes off.

Generation VI.X: It has incredible intellect and intuition. Whatever the situation, it remains calm and collected.
Generation VI.Y: When its head was bitten, toxins entered Slowpoke's head and unlocked an extraordinary power.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Slowking undertakes research every day in an effort to solve the mysteries of the world. However, this Pokémon apparently forgets everything it has learned if the Shellder on its head comes off.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Slowking undertakes research every day in an effort to solve the mysteries of the world. However, this Pokémon apparently forgets everything it has learned if the Shellder on its head comes off.

Generation VII.Sun: A poisonous bite reacted with its system, blessing it with the enhanced intellect of a genius. It has full control of its psychic powers.
Generation VII.Moon: This Pokémon is so famed for its intellect that a proverb still persists in some regions: "When in doubt, ask Slowking."
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: It's constantly coming up with new ideas that would change the world, but as soon as it hits upon a new idea, it forgets it.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: It's called "the sage of the sea." It engages in battles of wits with Oranguru , but the result is usually a draw.

Generation VIII.Sword: A combination of toxins and the shock of evolving has increased Shellder's intelligence to the point that Shellder now controls Slowking.
Generation VIII.Shield: While chanting strange spells, this Pokémon combines its internal toxins with what it's eaten, creating strange potions.
Generation VIII.Brilliant Diamond: Being bitten by Shellder gave it intelligence comparable to that of internationally recognized scientists.
Generation VIII.Shining Pearl: Being bitten by Shellder gave it intelligence comparable to that of internationally recognized scientists.

Generation IX.Scarlet: It administers its potions to weakened Pokémon it sees. These potions are derived from poison and secreted from holes in Slowking’s horns.
Generation IX.Violet: It creates potions by mixing toxins with the food it’s eaten. Not even Slowking itself knows what effects the potions will have.

Generation V.Black: Abundant Shrine ( Surfing in rippling water )
Generation V.White: Abundant Shrine ( Surfing in rippling water )

Generation VIII.Shield: Trade Version 1.2.0+ ( Johtonian Form ) / Version 1.3.0+ ( Galarian Form )
